TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MediaCommands extends System.Object
public ref class MediaCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供媒体相关命令的标准集。

span.span: Provides a standard set of media related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中的命令以及其他命令库类中的命令（ 如和）用于表示应用程序程序员经常遇到的一组常见命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令仅表示的实例 ，而不表示命令的实现逻辑。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 实现逻辑通过绑定到命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command via a . 例如，如果在控件（命令目标）上执行命令，则命令目标可能不会提供执行命令的逻辑，因此，应用程序编写器将负责编写确定命令目标如何处理命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic which performs the command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer will be responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target will handle the command. 许多控件确实为命令库中的许多命令提供实现逻辑。Many controls do provide implementation logic for many of the commands in the command library. 例如 ， 类为命令 、命令 、命令、命令和命令提供逻辑。 For example, the class provides logic for the command, command, command, command, and command. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅命令[概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BoostBass As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ BoostBass { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“提升基础”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Boost Base command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示开启或关闭低音增强的意图。This command indicates the intention to toggle the bass boost on or off. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是实际的实现响应命令;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示要减小通道值的意图。This command indicates the intention to decrement the channel value. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是实际的实现响应命令;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
